    • jasima.core.util中NotifierListener的使用

      实现NotifierListener的jasima.core.util中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AbstractResultSaver
      Base class for result saver.
      class  ConsolePrinter
      Prints experiment messages to the console.
      class  ExcelSaver
      Saves results of an experiment in a handy excel file.
      class  ResultSaver
      This class uses Java's serialization mechanism to save experiment results in a binary file.
      class  TraceFileProducer
      Produces a detailed log of all trace messages of a Simulation in a text file.
      class  XmlSaver
      Saves (final) experiment results in an XML file.

    • jasima.shopSim.core中NotifierListener的使用

      jasima.shopSim.core中NotifierListener的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  JobListener
      This class can be used as a base class for classes collecting results based on job releases/job completions.
      interface  ShopListener
      This class can be used as a base class for classes collecting results based on job releases/job completions.
      interface  WorkStationListener
      Possible base class for workstation listeners.
      实现NotifierListener的jasima.shopSim.core中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ShopListenerBase
      This class can be used as a base class for classes collecting results based on job releases/job completions.
      声明为NotifierListener的jasima.shopSim.core中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>[] ShopExperiment.machineListener 
      private NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>[] ShopExperiment.shopListener 
      返回NotifierListener的jasima.shopSim.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>[] ShopExperiment.getMachineListener()
      Gets the complete list of WorkStation listeners.
      NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>[] ShopExperiment.getMachineListenerSpecific(java.lang.String name)
      Returns an array of all listeners registered for a given machine registered before using #addMachineListener(String, NotifierListener).
      NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>[] ShopExperiment.getShopListener()
      Gets the complete list of Shop listeners.
      参数类型为NotifierListener的jasima.shopSim.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ShopExperiment.addMachineListener(NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object> l)
      Adds a WorkStation listener to be installed on each WorkStation in the experiment.
      void ShopExperiment.addMachineListener(java.lang.String name, NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object> l)
      Adds a WorkStation-listener to be installed on a certain WorkStation.
      void ShopExperiment.addShopListener(NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object> l)
      Adds a shop listener to be installed on the experiment's Shop.
      void Shop.installMachineListener(NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object> listener, boolean cloneIfPossible)
      Adds a listener to all WorkStations in the shop.
      void ShopExperiment.setMachineListener(NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>[] machineListener)
      Sets a list of WorkStation listeners to be installed on each WorkStation.
      void ShopExperiment.setShopListener(NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>[] shopListener)
      Sets a list of Shop listeners to be installed on the shop.

    • jasima.shopSim.util中NotifierListener的使用

      实现NotifierListener的jasima.shopSim.util中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BasicJobStatCollector
      Collects a variety of job statistics: cMax (completion time of last job finished), percentage tardy, number of tardy jobs, flowtime, tardiness.
      class  BatchStatCollector
      Collects batch statistics (flowtime and tardiness).
      class  ExtendedJobStatCollector
      Collects a variety of job statistics that are not produced by the BasicJobStatCollector.
      class  MachineStatCollector
      Produces basic statistics for each workstation it is installed on (like utilization, average queue length, average setup time per operation).
